title: Device Chat
subtitle: Control your devices with natural language

responses.welcome: Hello! I can help you control your connected devices. Try saying "Turn on the living room TV" or "Set temperature to 22 degrees".
responses.tvOn: 📺 Living Room TV is now ON. Current channel: Netflix Home
responses.volumeAdjusted: 🔊 Volume adjusted to 65%. Would you like me to change the channel?
responses.tvReady: 📺 TV is ready for commands. I can change channels, adjust volume, or switch inputs.
responses.thermostatSet: 🌡️ Thermostat set to {{temp}}°C. Current temperature: 20°C. Heating mode activated.
responses.thermostatStatus: 🌡️ Current temperature is 20°C, set to 22°C. Would you like to adjust it?
responses.speakerOffline: 🔇 Kitchen Speaker is currently offline. Last seen 1 hour ago. Would you like me to try reconnecting?
responses.speakerReady: 🎵 Speaker connected! What would you like to play?
responses.industrialStatus: ⚙️ Industrial Panel A status: Normal operation. Pressure: 85%. All systems green.
responses.deviceNotSpecified: I understand you want to "{{command}}". Could you specify which device? I can control: {{devices}}.

noDevices.title: No Chat-Enabled Devices
noDevices.subtitle: Enable chat integration in the Devices tab
noDevices.description: There are currently no devices available for chat control. Please enable chat integration for devices in the Devices tab.
